title: Letâ€™s Scan
des: Full-stack project using MERN technology. Enables restaurant owners to generate QR codes for table-side ordering. Users can scan QR codes to order via a website.Vendors can view order lists and payments on the dashboard.

title: Desi Bazar
des: E-commerce project built with React. Manages user details such as profiles, wishlists, and shopping bags with Redux-toolkit and local storage. No payment integration; frontend only

title: Spotify Song List Clone
des: It's a spotify clone, where you can track yours up-to-date songs list, That you are listening in your spotify

title: Film-Chicks
des: Film-chicks is a dynamic web app. Offer users the latest movie releases, detailed, and personalized recommendations.

title: Drag It
des: Crafted a dynamic project using React Flow

title: Snake Game
des: This Snake Game is a classic and entertaining web-based game built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It brings back the nostalgia of the retro Snake Game but with a modern twist. Snake Game

title: Budget App
des: The Budget App is a simple and intuitive web application designed to help users manage their finances effectively. It allows users to create budgets, track expenses, and analyze their spending.

title: Tic Tac Teo
des: This is a simple Tic Tac Toe game built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It's a classic two-player game where players take turns marking their symbol (X or O) in a 3x3 grid. The objective is to achieve three of your symbols in a row horizontally, vertically, or diagonally before your opponent

title: Password Generator
des: This is a simple Password Generator App that helps you generate strong and secure passwords. The application is built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to provide a user-friendly and efficient password generation experience.

title: Quiz Game
des: Welcome to the Quiz App! This interactive web application is designed to allow users to take quizzes on various topics and test their knowledge. The application is built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Dictionary App
des: The Dictionary App is a simple web application that allows users to look up the definitions of words. This app is built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, making it lightweight and easy to use.
